title: classified in this group in so far as principal function of these is transaction of public business
clause_text: classified in this group in so far as principal function of these is transaction of public business and the keeping of books and records;

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
